level.heading: Legislative History of Law 1-117
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 1-117, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-4301.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-85
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 16-4301.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Repeal of Uniform Arbitration Act: D.C. Law 17-111, § 3, Feb. 27, 2008, 55 DCR 1847, provided: "Effective July 1, 2009, Chapter 43 of Title 16 of the District of Columbia Official Code is repealed."
Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Arbitration Act.
